data.text:
@ISNAHQ What benefit does the Deen Squad bring the Ummah?
Is the methdology of the DS upon Sunnah? Way of Righteous predecessors? eg. Sahabah? Tabi'een? Tabi' Tabi'een?
Is Entertainment the ONLY way to teach Deen of Allah?
Is the Prophetic da'wah no longer applicable for Western Muslims? https://t.co/bd8dq624FB
